name: criminal scene unsolved case - hidden object
name_original: criminal scene unsolved case - hidden object
description:
Criminal Scene Unsolved Case - free hidden object game! Are you ready to solve murder cases?
Download now and play for free.
Become the detective and solve the case by investigating evidence.

FEATURES:
• Investigate crime scenes from 25 levels within 2 min
• Examine clues and analyze evidence
• Help the family members of victim to get justice
PLEASE NOTE – This game is completely free to play, you must be at least 13 years old to play or download Criminal Scene Unsolved Case.
